content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'Alert'
| where TimeGenerated > ago(6h)
| project TimeGenerated, Resource, AlertName_s, MonitorCondition_s, SeverityLevel_s, OperationName, _ResourceId
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: ðŸš¨ Fired Alerts (last 6 hours)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'Alert'
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 30m), SeverityLevel_s
| render timechart
content.title: ðŸ“ˆ Alert Volume by Severity

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'Alert'
| summarize TotalAlerts=count(), UniqueResources=dcount(_ResourceId), UniqueAlerts=dcount(AlertName_s)
| project TotalAlerts, UniqueResources, UniqueAlerts
content.title: ðŸ§¾ Summary Stats
